commands.name: key-search
commands.title: Key Search
commands.subtitle: search for a consul key
commands.description: search for a consul key in repository

preferences.name: consulRepositoryPath
preferences.title: Consul Repository Path
preferences.description: The local path of the consul server

scripts.prepublishOnly:
echo "

It seems like you are trying to publish the Raycast extension to npm.

If you did intend to publish it to npm, remove the \`prepublishOnly\` script and rerun \`npm publish\` again.
If you wanted to publish it to the Raycast Store instead, use \`npm run publish\` instead.

" && exit 1
